## whilst() function

Equivalent of `while` loop. Calls the `task` function while the `test` function returns `true`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function whilst<T>(test: AsyncTask<boolean>, task: AsyncTask<T>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  test | [AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean&gt; | The function that test if the process should continue |
|  task | [AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The task to execute while <code>test</code> pass |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
